Document.Focus: Targeted therapy: questions to ask your doctor

QAPair.Question: Do you have information about Targeted therapy: questions to ask your doctor
QAPair.Answer: You are having a targeted therapy to try to kill cancer cells. You may receive targeted therapy alone or also have other treatments at the same time. Your health care provider may need to follow you closely while you are having targeted therapy. You will also need to learn how best to care for yourself during this time. Below are some questions you may want to ask your doctor.
